welcome.title: Welcome to Bản Hòa
welcome.description: The Yên Hòa cultural village is a place that preserves the unique cultural identity of the ethnic groups in Tương Dương, Nghệ An. Visitors can admire the stilt houses, traditional costumes, and enjoy the local cuisine.

banners.title: Welcome to Yen Hoa Village
banners.description: Yen Hoa village, located in My Ly commune, Tuong Duong district, Nghe An province, is a beautiful Thai village. It preserves unique traditional cultural features. Visitors can immerse themselves in the fresh nature and discover unique cultural values.

banners.title: Thai Ethnic Identity
banners.description: Xoe dance is a traditional dance of the Thai people, expressing the spirit of solidarity and hospitality. Visitors can join hands with the locals in graceful Xoe circles.

banners.title: Brocade Weaving Village
banners.description: Brocade weaving in Yen Hoa has a long history. Brocade products with exquisite patterns and vibrant colors are meaningful gifts for tourists.

banners.title: Local Specialties
banners.description: Northwestern cuisine features unique sticky rice dishes like cassava sticky rice, colorful sticky rice, bamboo-tube grilled rice (com lam), and the Ha Nhi people's red rice. Enjoy them with 'chẳm chéo' dip and other specialties like grilled chicken, grilled fish, or dried buffalo meat.

banners.title: Sacred Ancient Tower
banners.description: Xop Lot Tower is an ancient architectural work, bearing the imprint of Buddhism. This is a spiritual destination for local people and tourists.
